meanings.definition: Not able to be called back
meanings.sent1: The toy was noncallable once it was broken beyond repair.
meanings.sent2: The noncallable contract ensured that the price would remain fixed.
meanings.sent3: The noncallable sandwich was so stale, it could be used as a doorstop.
meanings.sent4: Her noncallable determination to succeed was like an unbreakable shield.
meanings.sent5: The noncallable mountain stood tall and unyielding against the storm.

meanings.definition: Not subject to being called back
meanings.sent1: The noncallable ticket meant he could attend the concert without worry.
meanings.sent2: The noncallable decision was final and could not be reversed.
meanings.sent3: The noncallable cat refused to come when called, living by its own rules.
meanings.sent4: His noncallable loyalty to his friends was unwavering, like a rock in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The noncallable star shone brightly in the night sky, never fading away.
